name: tcmb-exchange-rates
description: Get exchange rates announced by the Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey (as known as CBRT or TCMB) easily with currency, date, data type or encoding options.

scripts.minify: uglifyjs lib/index.js --compress -b beautify=false,preamble='"// tcmb-exchange-rates, MIT, https://github.com/alisabrigok/tcmb-exchange-rates, by Ali Sabri GÖK <alisabrigok@gmail.com> (http://www.alisabri.com)"'  --source-map lib/index.min.js.map --in-source-map lib/index.js.map --mangle -o lib/index.min.js
scripts.prepare: npm run compile && npm run minify

author: Ali Sabri GÖK <alisabrigok@gmail.com> (http://www.alisabri.com)
